name: DOCS_RCVD_RES_SENS
description: The DOCS_RCVD_RES_SENS table contains information about compiled results susceptibility.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RES_SENS_KEY_CMP
columns.description: The key which links the result susceptibility with the order.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_N_CMP
columns.description: The free text name of the susceptibility organism.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_CMP_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the organism to which this susceptibility was mapped.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_CMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the organism.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_SUBID
columns.description: A unique ID to differentiate multiple tests on the same organism.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_CMT
columns.description: The comment for a result organism (populated if a single-line value).

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_CMT_SL
columns.description: The start line for the result organism's comment (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ORG_CMT_EL
columns.description: The end line for the result organism's comment (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ANT_NM_CMP
columns.description: The free text name of the antibiotic used.

columns.name: RES_SENS_ANTIB_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: The internal category of the antibiotic to which this susceptibility was mapped.

columns.name: RES_SENS_SUS_NM_CMP
columns.description: The free text name of the susceptibility result.

columns.name: RES_SENS_SUSC_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: The internal category of the antibiotic to which this susceptibility was mapped.

columns.name: RES_SENS_VALUE_SL
columns.description: The start line for the result susceptibility value (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_SENS_VALUE_EL
columns.description: The end line for the result susceptibility value (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_SENS_CMT_CMP
columns.description: The free text comment for this susceptibility.

columns.name: RES_SENS_COMMENT_SL
columns.description: The start line for the result susceptibility comment (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_SENS_COMMENT_EL
columns.description: The end line for the result susceptibility comment (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_SENS_MTH_NM_CMP
columns.description: The free text name of the method used to assess the susceptibility.

columns.name: RES_SEN_MTHD_CMP_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the procedure that was used to assess the susceptibility.
